snippet: The New York Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews conducted April 30 to May 3 with 1,027 adults throughout the United States. Of these, 868 said they were registered to vote.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews conducted April 30 to May 3 with 1,027 adults throughout the United States. Of these, 868 said they were registered to vote.

headline.main: How the New York Times/CBS News Poll Was Conducted
